extensions.name: Three.js + React Three Fiber
extensions.description: 3D rendering engine with React bindings and helper components.
setup_instructions: Add a basic scene example in src/features/ if needed

extensions.name: Stripe Payments
extensions.description: Payment processing with Stripe Elements and checkout integration.
setup_instructions: User action: create a Stripe account at stripe.com and copy the publishable key

extensions.name: Clerk Authentication
extensions.description: Full authentication system with login, signup, OAuth, and user management.
setup_instructions: Create src/features/auth/ with SignIn, SignUp, and UserButton components
Add protected route wrapper using useAuth() hook
User action: create a Clerk project at clerk.com and copy the publishable key

extensions.name: TanStack Query
extensions.description: Powerful data fetching and caching with automatic background refetching.
setup_instructions: Follow patterns in .claude/rules/api.md for hook structure

extensions.name: Zod
extensions.description: TypeScript-first schema validation for API responses, forms, and environment variables.
setup_instructions: Create src/lib/schemas/ directory for shared schemas
Use z.infer<typeof schema> for TypeScript type derivation
Validate API responses with schema.parse() in fetch hooks

extensions.name: Motion (Framer Motion)
extensions.description: Production-ready animation library for React with gesture support.
setup_instructions: Create src/hooks/useAnimationConfig.ts for shared animation presets
Use AnimatePresence for exit animations on route changes

extensions.name: react-i18next
extensions.description: Internationalization framework with browser language detection and namespace support.
setup_instructions: Install packages: pnpm add react-i18next i18next i18next-browser-languagedetector
Create src/locales/en.json and src/locales/fr.json translation files
Use useTranslation() hook in components: const { t } = useTranslation()

extensions.name: MDX Blog
extensions.description: Write blog posts in MDX with frontmatter support and Vite integration.
setup_instructions: Create src/content/posts/ directory for MDX files
Create src/features/blog/ with PostList and PostDetail components

extensions.name: Playwright E2E Testing
extensions.description: End-to-end browser testing with auto-waiting and cross-browser support.
setup_instructions: Create e2e/ directory for test files
Add scripts to package.json: test:e2e and test:e2e:ui
Add e2e example: e2e/home.spec.ts testing the landing page

extensions.name: Storybook
extensions.description: Component development environment with isolated rendering and visual testing.
setup_instructions: Run: npx storybook init --builder vite (or configure manually)
Import src/index.css in preview.ts for Tailwind support
Add scripts to package.json: storybook and build-storybook

extensions.name: Zustand
extensions.description: Minimal state management with hooks-based API and no boilerplate.
setup_instructions: Use selectors for performance: const count = useAppStore((s) => s.count)

extensions.name: Resend Email
extensions.description: Modern email API for sending transactional emails. Free tier: 100 emails/day.
setup_instructions: Add RESEND_API_KEY to .env.example (server-side only, NOT VITE_ prefixed)
Create API route or serverless function for sending emails
User action: create a Resend account at resend.com and copy the API key
